title: Pond's Clarant B3 Anti-Dark Spot Correcting Cream Normal To Oily Skin 7oz
description: Keep Those Spots at Bay Ponds Clarant B3 Moisturizer, with its rich and creamy formula, helps tone your skin and keep dark spots away. This cream also reduces and prevents age spots and blotching to give you radiant-looking skin.Doesn't clog poresEnriched with Vitamin B and CDermatologist-testedPonds Clarant B3 Moisturizer contains Vitamin C with its antioxidants that help renew your skin by reducing wrinkles. Vitamin B3 fights discoloration and uneven skin tone.Just For You: Normal to oily skin A Closer Look: This cream is tested by dermatologists and is hypoallergenic. It prevents clogged pores and leaves a lovely glow on your face.You Won't Find: Harmful chemicals Get Started: Apply daily on cleansed face and neck alone or under makeup as a base in the morning. Use it after cleansing at night for noticeable results.
